key.name: skip-warning-dialog
key.description: Whether the warning dialog in development versions of Evolution is skipped.

key.name: attachment-view
key.description: Initial view for attachment bar widgets. "0" is Icon View, "1" is List View.

key.name: start-offline
key.description: Whether Evolution will start up in offline mode instead of online mode.

key.name: folder-paths
key.description: List of paths for the folders to be synchronized to disk for offline usage.

key.name: express-mode
key.description: Flag that enables a much simplified user interface.

key.name: buttons-visible
key.description: Whether the window buttons should be visible.

key.name: buttons-style
key.description: The style of the window buttons. Can be "text", "icons", "both", "toolbar". If "toolbar" is set, the style of the buttons is determined by the GNOME toolbar setting.

key.name: toolbar-visible
key.description: Whether the toolbar should be visible.

key.name: sidebar-visible
key.description: Whether the sidebar should be visible.

key.name: statusbar-visible
key.description: Whether the status bar should be visible.

key.name: default-component-id
key.summary: ID or alias of the component to be shown by default at start-up.
key.description: ID or alias of the component to be shown by default at start-up.

key.name: folder-bar-width
key.description: The default width for the sidebar, in pixels.
